text: “Kantri Elam, ko an mɨdorozir gumaziba bar moghɨra mɨdorozimɨn ariaghire. Ezɨ an mɨdorozir gumazibar moziba bar an mozim okarizɨ, a tongɨra iti. Elamia God gɨfozir puvatɨgha, me angamɨra ikiavɨra ikia gumazamizir avɨrim gamizɨ, me aguava atiati. Me datɨrɨghɨn uaghira Oveaghuezibar Nguibamɨn ikia, gumazir aremezibar tongɨn ireghav ikia bar aghumsɨki.
